name: Darren & the One-Eye Baby - Collector's Editions

metadata.name: By The Sea (Darren & the One-Eye Baby - Collector's Edition #1)
metadata.description:
"By The Sea" is the first in a series of limited Collectors' Edition digital collectible artworks based on the "Darren and the One-Eye Baby" children's series.

Created by DarrenSRS, "Darren and the One-Eye Baby" that takes readers on an exciting journey filled with adventure and magic. The story follows the adventures of Darren the penguin and his mysterious friend Zuzi, a one-eyed creature from another planet. Together, they traverse the world, encountering new and exciting challenges along the way. 

Zuzi is a magical being with unique powers, and Darren learns along the way that he must rely on his friend's abilities as well as his own wits to complete their various objectives. The two form a tight bond as they explore the world, facing obstacles and making new friends along the way. Children will love the excitement and whimsy of this book, and will enjoy the imaginative illustrations that bring the world of Darren and Zuzi to life. From the frozen fields of the South Pole to the scorching plains of the African continent, "Darren and the One-Eye Baby" takes little readers on a journey they'll never forget.
